actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a carryback and carryover of certain foreign taxes on mineral income.

summary.text: Provides under the Internal Revenue Code a carryback for two years and a carryover for 5 years of foreign taxes on mineral income which are disallowed for a particular tax year for purposes of entitlement to a tax credit by a taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a carryback and carryover of certain foreign taxes on mineral income.
